oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John C. Calhoun portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of John C. Calhoun ((1782-1850) sitting from the waist up. He wears a dark suit and necktie. One hand holds a papers and the other hand rests on his knee. His elbow rests on a table with books.

U.S. Senator from South Carolina, 1832-1843; 1845-1850. U.S. Congressman from South Carolina, 1811-1817. Secretary of War, 1817-1825. Secretary of State, 1844-1845. Vice President of the U.S., 1825-1832.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Calhoun, John C. (John Caldwell), 1782-1850
